verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Zophar <S%H6691><s%> the Naamathite, <S%H5284><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> do my thoughts <S%H5587><s%> cause me to answer, <S%H7725><s%> and for <S%H5668><s%> this I make haste. <S%H2363><s%>
I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the check <S%H4148><s%> of my reproach, <S%H3639><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of my understanding <S%H4480><s%> <S%H998><s%> causeth me to answer. <S%H6030><s%>
Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not this <S%H2063><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> old, <S%H5703><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> man <S%H120><s%> was placed <S%H7760><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%>

That <S%H3588><s%> the triumphing <S%H7445><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is short, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7138><s%> and the joy <S%H8057><s%> of the hypocrite <S%H2611><s%> but for <S%H5704><s%> a moment? <S%H7281><s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> his excellency <S%H7863><s%> mount up <S%H5927><s%> to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and his head <S%H7218><s%> reach <S%H5060><s%> unto the clouds; <S%H5645><s%>
Yet he shall perish <S%H6><s%> forever <S%H5331><s%> like his own dung: <S%H1561><s%> they which have seen <S%H7200><s%> him shall say, <S%H559><s%> Where <S%H335><s%> is he?

He shall fly away <S%H5774><s%> as a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> be found: <S%H4672><s%> yea, he shall be chased away <S%H5074><s%> as a vision <S%H2384><s%> of the night. <S%H3915><s%>

The eye <S%H5869><s%> also which saw <S%H7805><s%> him shall see him no <S%H3808><s%> more; <S%H3254><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall his place <S%H4725><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> behold <S%H7789><s%> him.
His children <S%H1121><s%> shall seek to please <S%H7521><s%> the poor, <S%H1800><s%> and his hands <S%H3027><s%> shall restore <S%H7725><s%> their goods. <S%H202><s%>
His bones <S%H6106><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> of the sin of his youth, <S%H5934><s%> which shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him in <S%H5921><s%> the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> wickedness <S%H7451><s%> be sweet <S%H4985><s%> in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> though he hide <S%H3582><s%> it under <S%H8478><s%> his tongue; <S%H3956><s%>
Though he spare <S%H2550><s%> <S%H5921><s%> it, and forsake <S%H5800><s%> it not; <S%H3808><s%> but keep it still <S%H4513><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> his mouth: <S%H2441><s%>
Yet his meat <S%H3899><s%> in his bowels <S%H4578><s%> is turned, <S%H2015><s%> it is the gall <S%H4846><s%> of asps <S%H6620><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> him.
He hath swallowed down <S%H1104><s%> riches, <S%H2428><s%> and he shall vomit them up again: <S%H6958><s%> God <S%H410><s%> shall cast them out <S%H3423><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> his belly. <S%H990><s%>
He shall suck <S%H3243><s%> the poison <S%H7219><s%> of asps: <S%H6620><s%> the viper's <S%H660><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall slay <S%H2026><s%> him.
He shall not <S%H408><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the rivers, <S%H6390><s%> the floods, <S%H5104><s%> the brooks <S%H5158><s%> of honey <S%H1706><s%> and butter. <S%H2529><s%>

That which he labored for <S%H3022><s%> shall he restore, <S%H7725><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> swallow it down: <S%H1104><s%> according to his substance <S%H2428><s%> shall the restitution <S%H8545><s%> be, and he shall not <S%H3808><s%> rejoice <S%H5965><s%> therein.

Because <S%H3588><s%> he hath oppressed <S%H7533><s%> and hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the poor; <S%H1800><s%> because he hath violently taken away <S%H1497><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> which he built <S%H1129><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> feel <S%H3045><s%> quietness <S%H7961><s%> in his belly, <S%H990><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> save <S%H4422><s%> of that which he desired. <S%H2530><s%>
There shall none <S%H369><s%> of his meat <S%H400><s%> be left; <S%H8300><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5921><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> man look <S%H2342><s%> for his goods. <S%H2898><s%>

In the fullness <S%H4390><s%> of his sufficiency <S%H5607><s%> he shall be in straits: <S%H3334><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H6001><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> upon him.

When he <S%H1961><s%> is about to fill <S%H4390><s%> his belly, <S%H990><s%> God shall cast <S%H7971><s%> the fury <S%H2740><s%> of his wrath <S%H639><s%> upon him, and shall rain <S%H4305><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> him while he is eating. <S%H3894><s%>
He shall flee <S%H1272><s%> from the iron <S%H1270><s%> weapon, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5402><s%> and the bow <S%H7198><s%> of steel <S%H5154><s%> shall strike him through. <S%H2498><s%>

It is drawn, <S%H8025><s%> and cometh out <S%H3318><s%> of the body; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1465><s%> yea, the glittering sword <S%H1300><s%> cometh <S%H1980><s%> out of his gall: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4846><s%> terrors <S%H367><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> him.

All <S%H3605><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> shall be hid <S%H2934><s%> in his secret places: <S%H6845><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> blown <S%H5301><s%> shall consume <S%H398><s%> him; it shall go ill <S%H7489><s%> with him that is left <S%H8300><s%> in his tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>
The heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall reveal <S%H1540><s%> his iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> against him.
The increase <S%H2981><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> shall depart, <S%H1540><s%> and his goods shall flow away <S%H5064><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his wrath. <S%H639><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the portion <S%H2506><s%> of a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H120><s%> from God, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> and the heritage <S%H5159><s%> appointed <S%H561><s%> unto him by God. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H410><s%>
